proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Select proxies to be used by your crawler.

tmsUrl.title: TMS Website URL
tmsUrl.description: The full URL of your TMS login page (e.g., https://tms49.nepsetms.com.np/login).

tmsUsername.title: TMS Username/Client Code
tmsUsername.description: Your TMS Client Code or Username.

geminiApiKey.title: Gemini API Key
geminiApiKey.description: API Key for Google Gemini (for Captcha solving).

historyDurationMonths.title: History Duration (Months)
historyDurationMonths.description: Number of months to scrape trade history for (e.g. 1, 12, 60).

checkOrders.title: Verify Orders (Daily History)
checkOrders.description: If true, extract today's order history after executing trades.

checkDashboard.title: Extract Dashboard (Post-Trade)
checkDashboard.description: If true, extract dashboard data (collateral, limits) after executing trades.
